Constants used in the V.Y.R.A. universe. According to “Pyright” Annotations like ‘Final[str]’ are not allowed.

class vyra_base.defaults.entries.FunctionConfigEntry(tags, type, ros2type, functionname, displayname, description, displaystyle, params=<factory>, returns=<factory>, qosprofile=10, callback=None, periodic=None)¶

Bases: object

Contains the function configuration.

Primitive Python object that stores the function settings. This object is used to make funciton configuration typesafe and available for adding dds communication nodes for other modules. Makes use of the memory saving __slots__.

tags¶

Tags for the function.

Type:

list[str]

type¶

Type of the function.

Type:

FunctionConfigBaseTypes

ros2type¶

ROS2 type of the function.

Type:

Any

functionname¶

Name of the function.

Type:

str

displayname¶

Display name of the function.

Type:

str

description¶

Description of the function.

Type:

str

displaystyle¶

Display style of the function.

Type:

FunctionConfigDisplaystyle

params¶

Parameters of the function.

Type:

list[FunctionConfigBaseParams]

returns¶

Return values of the function.

Type:

list[FunctionConfigBaseReturn]

qosprofile¶

Quality of Service profile for the function.

Type:

Union[int, QoSProfile]

callback¶

Only !vyra-callable!. Function to be called when the function is invoked.

Type:

Callable, optional

periodic¶

Only !vyra-speaker!. Function to be called periodically.

Type:

FunctionConfigPeriodicSpeaker, optional

callback: Optional[Callable]¶
description: str¶
displayname: str¶
displaystyle: FunctionConfigDisplaystyle¶
functionname: str¶
params: list[FunctionConfigBaseParams]¶
periodic: Optional[FunctionConfigPeriodicSpeaker]¶
qosprofile: Union[int, QoSProfile]¶
returns: list[FunctionConfigBaseReturn]¶
ros2type: Any¶
tags: list[str]¶
type: FunctionConfigBaseTypes¶

vyra_base.defaults.info module¶

class vyra_base.defaults.info.AuthorInfo¶

Bases: object

Info about the development team.

Contains nested @dataclasses classes which are logically related to the AuthorInfo class. It adds some additional information about the develoment team and the company behind the software solution.
